md:
giải nghĩa từ "notice" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan và các từ trái nghĩa.

**Notice** (noun)

* Meaning: a formal announcement or warning
* Example: "The company issued a notice to all employees about the new policy."
* Related words: announcement, warning, notification
* Antonyms: secrecy, concealment

**Notice** (verb)

* Meaning: to become aware of something or someone
* Example: "I didn't notice the mistake until I re-read the report."
* Related words: observe, perceive, detect
* Antonyms: overlook, ignore, disregard

**Notice** (verb)

* Meaning: to pay attention to something or someone
* Example: "The teacher asked the students to notice the details of the painting."
* Related words: attend, heed, regard
* Antonyms: neglect, disregard, ignore
html:
giải nghĩa từ "notice" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan và các từ trái nghĩa.

Notice (noun)

  • Meaning: a formal announcement or warning
  • Example: "The company issued a notice to all employees about the new policy."
  • Related words: announcement, warning, notification
  • Antonyms: secrecy, concealment

Notice (verb)

  • Meaning: to become aware of something or someone
  • Example: "I didn't notice the mistake until I re-read the report."
  • Related words: observe, perceive, detect
  • Antonyms: overlook, ignore, disregard

Notice (verb)

  • Meaning: to pay attention to something or someone
  • Example: "The teacher asked the students to notice the details of the painting."
  • Related words: attend, heed, regard
  • Antonyms: neglect, disregard, ignore
